// === WORLD (Checkpoints, Hazards, Respawn, Spawners) ===
On start of layout
→ System: Set CheckpointX to Player.X
→ System: Set CheckpointY to Player.Y

// Checkpoints (optional Checkpoint sprite)
On Player collides with Checkpoint
→ System: Set CheckpointX to Player.X
→ System: Set CheckpointY to Player.Y

// Hazards
On Player overlapping Hazard OR Player.Y > LayoutHeight + 64
→ Call function Respawn

// Respawn function
Function Respawn
→ Player: Compare HP > 1
  → Player: Subtract 1 from HP
  → Player: Set position to (CheckpointX, CheckpointY)
Else
  → System: Compare Lives > 0
    → System: Subtract 1 from Lives
    → Player: Set HP to 3
    → Player: Set position to (CheckpointX, CheckpointY)
  Else
    → System: Go to layout "GameOver" (if exists)

// Power-up spawners (example)
Every 10 seconds
→ System: Create object Power_Spread on layer "Main" at (random(256, 2048), 300)
Every 15 seconds
→ System: Create object Power_Rapid on layer "Main" at (random(256, 2048), 300)
Every 12 seconds
→ System: Create object Power_Health on layer "Main" at (random(256, 2048), 300)

// Enemy spawner (simple)
Every 6 seconds
→ System: Create object Enemy on layer "Main" at (random(256, 2048), 200)

// Enemy bullets damage player
On collision between EnemyBullet and Player
→ Player: Subtract 1 from HP
→ Destroy EnemyBullet
